title: CycloneDX Behavior Model
$comment: OWASP CycloneDX is an Ecma International standard (ECMA-424) developed in collaboration between the OWASP Foundation and Ecma Technical Committee 54 (TC54). The standard is published under a royalty-free patent policy. This JSON schema is the reference implementation and is licensed under the Apache License 2.0.

trigger.title: Trigger
trigger.description: The condition or event that initiates a behavior.

meta:enum.startup: Triggered during system or component initialisation.
meta:enum.shutdown: Triggered during system or component termination.
meta:enum.scheduled: Triggered at predetermined times or intervals.
meta:enum.event-driven: Triggered in response to a specific event.
meta:enum.signal: Triggered by a system or inter-process signal.
meta:enum.condition-based: Triggered when specific conditions are met.
meta:enum.unknown: The trigger mechanism is not known.

ordering.title: Ordering
ordering.description: Execution semantics for steps within a flow.

meta:enum.sequential: Steps execute in ordinal order. Each completes before the next begins.
meta:enum.unordered: All steps execute, but order is not guaranteed.
meta:enum.conditional: Step execution is determined by runtime conditions.

acknowledgment.title: Acknowledgment
acknowledgment.description: Indicates how the behavior or flow was identified. Multiple values indicate the behavior was both declared and observed.

meta:enum.declared: The behavior was explicitly declared, designed, or expected. Typically used for threat modelling, security requirements, and architectural documentation.
meta:enum.observed: The behavior was observed, detected, or measured during analysis or runtime. Typically used for anomaly detection, incident response, and behavioural analysis.

behaviors.title: Behaviors
behaviors.description: Behaviors performed by objects within the BOM.

flows.title: Flows
flows.description: Behavior flows that organise behaviors into operational patterns.

behaviorInstance.title: Behavior Instance
behaviorInstance.description: A behavior performed by one or more objects within the BOM.

actors.title: Actors
actors.description: References to objects that perform this behavior.

targets.title: Targets
targets.description: References to objects affected by this behavior.

behaviorFlow.title: Behavior Flow
behaviorFlow.description: An organised collection of behaviors forming a coherent process.

steps.title: Steps
steps.description: The steps that comprise this flow.

flowStep.title: Flow Step
flowStep.description: A single step within a behavior flow.

ordinal.title: Ordinal
ordinal.description: Position within the flow. Required when ordering is 'sequential' or omitted.

behavior.title: Behavior
behavior.description: The behavior performed in this step. Mutually exclusive with 'ref' and 'flow'.

ref.title: Behavior Reference
ref.description: Reference to a behavior instance. Mutually exclusive with 'behavior' and 'flow'.

flow.title: Flow Reference
flow.description: Reference to a nested flow. Mutually exclusive with 'behavior' and 'ref'.

actors.title: Actors
actors.description: References to objects that perform this step.

targets.title: Targets
targets.description: References to objects affected by this step.

behavior.title: Behavior
behavior.description: Specifies an action performed by an entity that may have security, privacy, safety, or operational implications. Values may represent a domain, a category within a domain, or a specific behavior within a category.

meta:enum.ai: Behaviours relating to artificial intelligence and machine learning operations.
meta:enum.ai:agent: Behaviours that enable autonomous agents to plan and execute tasks.
meta:enum.ai:agent:actsOnBehalfOfUser: The entity performs actions within a delegated user context.
meta:enum.ai:agent:delegatesTask: The entity assigns work to another agent.
meta:enum.ai:agent:plansAction: The entity determines steps to achieve goal.
meta:enum.ai:agent:receivesHumanDelegation: The entity accepts authority delegated by a human user.
meta:enum.ai:agent:reportsDelegatedAction: The entity notifies the delegating user of actions taken.
meta:enum.ai:agent:requestsUserApproval: The entity seeks explicit user authorisation before acting.
meta:enum.ai:agent:revisesPlan: The entity modifies approach based on results.
meta:enum.ai:explainability: Behaviours that provide interpretable explanations for model decisions.
meta:enum.ai:explainability:documentsModel: The entity records model design and behaviour.
meta:enum.ai:explainability:tracesPrediction: The entity records basis for output.
meta:enum.ai:explainability:visualizesModel: The entity renders model behaviour graphically.
meta:enum.ai:fairness: Behaviours that detect and mitigate bias in machine learning models.
meta:enum.ai:fairness:auditsModelFairness: The entity evaluates model for bias.
meta:enum.ai:fairness:detectsBias: The entity identifies unfair model behaviour.
meta:enum.ai:generative: Behaviours that produce content using generative models.
meta:enum.ai:generative:mitigatesHallucination: The entity reduces false content generation.
meta:enum.ai:inference: Behaviours that generate predictions using trained models.
meta:enum.ai:inference:batchesInference: The entity processes multiple inputs together.
meta:enum.ai:inference:cachesPrediction: The entity stores prediction for reuse.
meta:enum.ai:inference:ensemblesModels: The entity combines multiple model outputs.
meta:enum.ai:inference:infersInRealTime: The entity generates prediction with low latency.
meta:enum.ai:inference:ranksResults: The entity orders predictions by relevance.
meta:enum.ai:inference:scoresConfidence: The entity assigns certainty to prediction.
meta:enum.ai:management: Behaviours that deploy and manage machine learning models throughout their lifecycle.
meta:enum.ai:management:comparesModels: The entity evaluates relative model performance.
meta:enum.ai:management:deploysModel: The entity places model into service.
meta:enum.ai:management:loadsModel: The entity retrieves model for use.
meta:enum.ai:management:retiresModel: The entity removes model from service.
meta:enum.ai:management:rollsBackModel: The entity reverts to previous version.
meta:enum.ai:management:unloadsModel: The entity removes model from memory.
meta:enum.ai:quality: Behaviours that monitor and maintain model and data quality.
meta:enum.ai:quality:detectsConceptDrift: The entity identifies input-output relationship change.
meta:enum.ai:quality:detectsDataDrift: The entity identifies input distribution change.
meta:enum.ai:quality:engineersFeatures: The entity transforms raw data for model.
meta:enum.ai:quality:selectsFeatures: The entity chooses relevant input features.
meta:enum.ai:quality:validatesInputData: The entity checks inference input quality.
meta:enum.ai:robustness: Behaviours that defend against adversarial attacks and handle uncertain inputs.
meta:enum.ai:robustness:detectsAdversarialInput: The entity identifies crafted malicious input.
meta:enum.ai:training: Behaviours that prepare data and train machine learning models.
meta:enum.ai:training:checkpointsModel: The entity saves model state during training.
meta:enum.ai:training:fineTunesModel: The entity refines model for specific task.
meta:enum.ai:training:ingestsTrainingData: The entity acquires data for training.
meta:enum.ai:training:preprocessesTrainingData: The entity prepares data for training.
meta:enum.ai:training:trainsFederatedly: The entity trains on distributed data.
meta:enum.ai:training:validatesModel: The entity evaluates model during training.
meta:enum.ai:training:validatesTrainingData: The entity checks training data quality.
meta:enum.application: Behaviours relating to application-level request processing and business logic.
meta:enum.application:codeExecution: Behaviours that dynamically load and execute code at runtime.
meta:enum.application:codeExecution:compilesCode: The entity transforms source to executable form.
meta:enum.application:codeExecution:evaluatesExpre: The entity interprets and executes an expression.
meta:enum.application:codeExecution:executesNative: The entity runs an operating system command.
meta:enum.application:codeExecution:interpretsCode: The entity executes code without compilation.
meta:enum.application:codeExecution:invokesViaRefl: The entity calls method through reflection.
meta:enum.application:codeExecution:loadsCodeDynam: The entity loads executable code at runtime.
meta:enum.application:configuration: Behaviours that load and manage application configuration settings.
meta:enum.application:configuration:evaluatesFeatu: The entity checks feature toggle state.
meta:enum.application:controlFlow: Behaviours that manage the execution sequence and event handling within an application.
meta:enum.application:controlFlow:awaitsAsyncResul: The entity waits for asynchronous completion.
meta:enum.application:controlFlow:catchesException: The entity handles an error condition.
meta:enum.application:controlFlow:handlesEvent: The entity responds to an event.
meta:enum.application:controlFlow:invokesCallback: The entity executes a callback function.
meta:enum.application:controlFlow:invokesHandler: The entity calls a request handler.
meta:enum.application:controlFlow:schedulesAsyncOp: The entity queues work for later execution.
meta:enum.application:controlFlow:throwsException: The entity raises an error condition.
meta:enum.application:dependencyManagement: Behaviours that resolve and manage dependencies on other components.
meta:enum.application:dependencyManagement:closesC: The entity resumes calls to recovered dependency.
meta:enum.application:dependencyManagement:fallsBa: The entity uses alternative when primary fails.
meta:enum.application:dependencyManagement:injects: The entity provides component to dependent.
meta:enum.application:dependencyManagement:opensCi: The entity stops calls to failing dependency.
meta:enum.application:externalIntegration: Behaviours that communicate with external services and systems.
meta:enum.application:externalIntegration:callsExt: The entity invokes an external API.
meta:enum.application:externalIntegration:consumes: The entity receives event from external system.
meta:enum.application:externalIntegration:publishe: The entity sends event to external system.
meta:enum.application:externalIntegration:receives: The entity accepts callback from external service.
meta:enum.application:observability: Behaviours that emit telemetry for monitoring and debugging purposes.
meta:enum.application:observability:logsOperation: The entity records an operational event.
meta:enum.application:observability:recordsMetric: The entity captures a quantitative measurement.
meta:enum.application:observability:tracesRequest: The entity tracks request across services.
meta:enum.application:requestHandling: Behaviours that receive and process incoming requests.
meta:enum.application:requestHandling:bindsParamet: The entity maps request data to parameters.
meta:enum.application:requestHandling:receivesHttp: The entity accepts an HTTP request.
meta:enum.application:requestHandling:rejectsReque: The entity refuses to process request.
meta:enum.application:requestHandling:routesReques: The entity directs request to appropriate handler.
meta:enum.application:responseGeneration: Behaviours that construct and transmit responses to requests.
meta:enum.application:responseGeneration:redirects: The entity sends client to different location.
meta:enum.application:responseGeneration:sendsHttp: The entity transmits an HTTP response.
meta:enum.application:responseGeneration:setsCooki: The entity creates or modifies a cookie.
meta:enum.application:responseGeneration:setsHeade: The entity adds HTTP header to response.
meta:enum.application:stateManagement: Behaviours that maintain and synchronise application state across requests.
meta:enum.application:stateManagement:acquiresLock: The entity obtains exclusive access to resource.
meta:enum.application:stateManagement:beginsTransa: The entity starts an atomic operation group.
meta:enum.application:stateManagement:synchronizes: The entity maintains consistency across replicas.
meta:enum.data: Behaviours relating to the ingestion and transformation of structured and unstructured data.
meta:enum.data:encoding: Behaviours that apply specific encoding schemes to data.
meta:enum.data:encoding:appliesXor: The entity transforms data using XOR operation.
meta:enum.data:encoding:decodesBaseSixtyFour: The entity converts Base64 to original form.
meta:enum.data:encoding:encodesBaseSixtyFour: The entity converts data to Base64.
meta:enum.data:encoding:encodesUrl: The entity converts data for URL inclusion.
meta:enum.data:ingestion: Behaviours that acquire data from external sources.
meta:enum.data:ingestion:pollsSource: The entity periodically checks for new data.
meta:enum.data:ingestion:readsFile: The entity retrieves data from a file.
meta:enum.data:ingestion:readsStream: The entity consumes data from a continuous source.
meta:enum.data:ingestion:receivesInput: The entity accepts data from an external source.
meta:enum.data:ingestion:receivesMessage: The entity accepts a message from a queue.
meta:enum.data:ingestion:receivesRequest: The entity accepts an incoming request.
meta:enum.data:ingestion:subscribesToFeed: The entity registers to receive updates.
meta:enum.data:output: Behaviours that produce and transmit data to external consumers.
meta:enum.data:output:formatsResponse: The entity structures data for delivery.
meta:enum.data:output:producesOutput: The entity generates data for consumption.
meta:enum.data:output:publishesMessage: The entity sends a message to a queue.
meta:enum.data:output:rendersTemplate: The entity generates output from a template.
meta:enum.data:output:serializesObject: The entity converts object to transmittable form.
meta:enum.data:output:writesFile: The entity saves data to a file.
meta:enum.data:parsing: Behaviours that interpret and extract information from structured data formats.
meta:enum.data:parsing:decodesData: The entity converts encoded data to original form.
meta:enum.data:parsing:deserializesObject: The entity reconstructs object from serialised form.
meta:enum.data:parsing:extractsFields: The entity isolates specific data elements.
meta:enum.data:query: Behaviours that retrieve data based on specified criteria.
meta:enum.data:query:executesLdapQuery: The entity queries an LDAP directory.
meta:enum.data:query:executesNoSqlQuery: The entity queries a NoSQL database.
meta:enum.data:query:executesSearch: The entity performs full-text or indexed search.
meta:enum.data:query:executesSql: The entity runs a SQL statement.
meta:enum.data:query:executesXPath: The entity evaluates an XPath expression.
meta:enum.data:query:queriesData: The entity retrieves data matching criteria.
meta:enum.data:storage: Behaviours that persist and retrieve data from storage systems.
meta:enum.data:storage:cachesData: The entity stores data for quick retrieval.
meta:enum.data:storage:flushesCache: The entity writes cached data to persistent storage.
meta:enum.data:storage:invalidatesCache: The entity marks cached data as stale.
meta:enum.data:transformation: Behaviours that convert data from one form or structure to another.
meta:enum.data:transformation:encodesData: The entity converts data to encoded form.
meta:enum.data:transformation:enrichesData: The entity adds information from external sources.
meta:enum.data:transformation:joinsData: The entity combines data from multiple sources.
meta:enum.data:transformation:mapsData: The entity converts between data structures.
meta:enum.data:transformation:normalizesData: The entity converts to standard form.
meta:enum.data:transformation:transformsData: The entity converts data from one form to another.
meta:enum.evasion: Behaviours relating to techniques that avoid detection and analysis.
meta:enum.evasion:analysisResistance: Behaviours that detect and evade analysis environments.
meta:enum.evasion:analysisResistance:evadesDebugge: The entity modifies behaviour under debugging.
meta:enum.evasion:analysisResistance:evadesEmulato: The entity modifies behaviour under emulation.
meta:enum.evasion:analysisResistance:evadesSandbox: The entity modifies behaviour in sandbox.
meta:enum.evasion:analysisResistance:evadesVirtual: The entity modifies behaviour in VM.
meta:enum.evasion:analysisResistance:usesTimingEva: The entity uses delays to evade analysis.
meta:enum.evasion:antiSecurity: Behaviours that detect and disable security software.
meta:enum.evasion:antiSecurity:terminatesSecurityP: The entity kills security software processes.
meta:enum.evasion:indirection: Behaviours that use indirect methods to execute code.
meta:enum.evasion:indirection:resolvesApiDynamical: The entity finds API addresses at runtime.
meta:enum.evasion:obfuscation: Behaviours that obscure code and data to hinder analysis.
meta:enum.evasion:obfuscation:obfuscatesCode: The entity makes code difficult to analyse.
meta:enum.evasion:obfuscation:packsCode: The entity compresses or encrypts executable.
meta:enum.evasion:obfuscation:unpacksAtRuntime: The entity decompresses code during execution.
meta:enum.file: Behaviours relating to file system operations and disk management.
meta:enum.file:directory: Behaviours that create and navigate directory structures.
meta:enum.file:directory:changesDirectory: The entity sets current working directory.
meta:enum.file:directory:createsDirectory: The entity creates a new directory.
meta:enum.file:disk: Behaviours that manage storage volumes and disk-level operations.
meta:enum.file:disk:decryptsVolume: The entity decrypts a storage volume.
meta:enum.file:disk:encryptsVolume: The entity encrypts a storage volume.
meta:enum.file:disk:formatsVolume: The entity prepares storage for use.
meta:enum.file:disk:mountsVolume: The entity attaches a storage volume.
meta:enum.file:disk:unmountsVolume: The entity detaches a storage volume.
meta:enum.file:disk:wipesDisk: The entity securely erases disk contents.
meta:enum.file:operations: Behaviours that create and manipulate files.
meta:enum.file:operations:appendsToFile: The entity adds data to end of file.
meta:enum.file:operations:checksFileExistence: The entity verifies whether a file exists.
meta:enum.file:operations:createsFile: The entity creates a new file.
meta:enum.file:operations:opensFile: The entity prepares a file for access.
meta:enum.file:operations:renamesFile: The entity changes a file name.
meta:enum.file:operations:setsFilePermissions: The entity modifies file access permissions.
meta:enum.gui: Behaviours relating to graphical user interface interactions.
meta:enum.gui:display: Behaviours that render and monitor visual output.
meta:enum.gui:session: Behaviours that interact with user login sessions.
meta:enum.gui:session:interactsWithSession: The entity operates within user session.
meta:enum.gui:session:switchesSession: The entity changes active user session.
meta:enum.gui:window: Behaviours that create and manipulate graphical windows.
meta:enum.gui:window:createsWindow: The entity creates a graphical window.
meta:enum.hardware: Behaviours relating to hardware components and physical device interactions.
meta:enum.hardware:actuator: Behaviours that control physical actuators and output devices.
meta:enum.hardware:boot: Behaviours that verify and configure system startup processes.
meta:enum.hardware:boot:entersRecoveryMode: The entity boots via alternative path.
meta:enum.hardware:boot:executesSecureBoot: The entity verifies code integrity at startup.
meta:enum.hardware:boot:locksBootConfiguration: The entity prevents boot setting changes.
meta:enum.hardware:boot:recordsBootMeasurement: The entity logs boot component hashes.
meta:enum.hardware:boot:verifiesBootLoader: The entity validates boot loader authenticity.
meta:enum.hardware:firmware: Behaviours that manage and verify firmware integrity.
meta:enum.hardware:firmware:monitorsFirmwareIntegr: The entity checks for firmware tampering.
meta:enum.hardware:firmware:preventsFirmwareRollba: The entity blocks reversion to old firmware.
meta:enum.hardware:memory: Behaviours that protect and isolate memory regions.
meta:enum.hardware:memory:protectsStack: The entity defends against stack attacks.
meta:enum.hardware:memory:readsProtectedMemory: The entity accesses protected memory region.
meta:enum.hardware:memory:writesProtectedMemory: The entity modifies protected memory region.
meta:enum.hardware:peripheral: Behaviours that interact with peripheral devices and interfaces.
meta:enum.hardware:peripheral:accessesCamera: The entity interacts with camera hardware.
meta:enum.hardware:peripheral:accessesDisplay: The entity interacts with display hardware.
meta:enum.hardware:peripheral:accessesGpio: The entity reads or writes GPIO pins.
meta:enum.hardware:peripheral:accessesJtag: The entity uses JTAG debug interface.
meta:enum.hardware:peripheral:accessesKeyboard: The entity interacts with keyboard hardware.
meta:enum.hardware:peripheral:accessesStorageDevic: The entity interacts with storage hardware.
meta:enum.hardware:peripheral:accessesUsbDevice: The entity interacts with USB peripheral.
meta:enum.hardware:peripheral:configuresDma: The entity sets up direct memory access.
meta:enum.hardware:physicalSecurity: Behaviours that detect and respond to physical tampering.
meta:enum.hardware:physicalSecurity:respondsToTamp: The entity reacts to physical attack.
meta:enum.hardware:physicalSecurity:zeroizesKeys: The entity destroys keys on tamper detection.
meta:enum.hardware:security: Behaviours that utilise hardware security features and trusted execution environments.
meta:enum.hardware:security:anchorsInHardwareRoot: The entity uses tamper-resistant hardware for trust.
meta:enum.hardware:security:executesInTee: The entity runs in trusted execution environment.
meta:enum.hardware:security:generatesPufResponse: The entity uses physical unclonable function.
meta:enum.hardware:security:usesHsm: The entity employs hardware security module.
meta:enum.hardware:security:usesSecureElement: The entity employs dedicated security hardware.
meta:enum.hardware:sensor: Behaviours that read measurements from hardware sensors.
meta:enum.hardware:sensor:readsBloodPressure: The entity obtains blood pressure measurement.
meta:enum.hardware:sideChannelDefense: Behaviours that protect against side-channel attacks.
meta:enum.hardware:sideChannelDefense:resistsFault: The entity protects against induced faults.
meta:enum.hardware:sideChannelDefense:resistsPower: The entity protects against power-based attacks.
meta:enum.hardware:sideChannelDefense:resistsTimin: The entity protects against timing-based attacks.
meta:enum.network: Behaviours relating to network communication and data transmission between systems.
meta:enum.network:connection: Behaviours that establish and manage network connections.
meta:enum.network:connection:acceptsConnection: The entity receives an incoming connection.
meta:enum.network:connection:detectsConnectionLoss: The entity identifies a dropped connection.
meta:enum.network:connection:establishesConnection: The entity initiates a network connection.
meta:enum.network:connection:reconnects: The entity re-establishes a dropped connection.
meta:enum.network:connection:reusesConnection: The entity uses a pooled connection.
meta:enum.network:connection:sendsHeartbeat: The entity transmits a keep-alive signal.
meta:enum.network:connection:terminatesConnection: The entity closes a network connection.
meta:enum.network:discovery: Behaviours that locate and advertise network services and resources.
meta:enum.network:discovery:discoversService: The entity locates an available service.
meta:enum.network:discovery:probesPort: The entity checks if a port is open.
meta:enum.network:discovery:resolvesName: The entity translates a name to an address.
meta:enum.network:discovery:scansNetwork: The entity probes for active hosts or services.
meta:enum.network:protocol: Behaviours that negotiate and implement communication protocols.
meta:enum.network:protocol:downgradesProtocol: The entity falls back to a less secure protocol version.
meta:enum.network:protocol:framesMessage: The entity structures data for transmission.
meta:enum.network:protocol:negotiatesProtocol: The entity agrees on communication protocol with peer.
meta:enum.network:protocol:parsesMessage: The entity interprets received network data.
meta:enum.network:protocol:retransmitsMessage: The entity resends data after transmission failure.
meta:enum.network:protocol:upgradesProtocol: The entity transitions to a more secure protocol version.
meta:enum.network:protocol:validatesMessage: The entity verifies message format and integrity.
meta:enum.network:remoteInteraction: Behaviours that execute operations on remote systems.
meta:enum.network:remoteInteraction:accessesRemote: The entity controls a remote graphical interface.
The entity interacts with a remote command line.
meta:enum.network:remoteInteraction:executesRemote: The entity runs a command on a remote system.
meta:enum.network:remoteInteraction:invokesRemoteP: The entity calls a function on a remote system.
meta:enum.network:remoteInteraction:sendsEmail: The entity transmits an email message.
meta:enum.network:remoteInteraction:sendsSms: The entity transmits a text message.
meta:enum.network:remoteInteraction:transfersFile: The entity sends or receives a file remotely.
meta:enum.network:routing: Behaviours that direct network traffic to its destination.
meta:enum.network:routing:configuresProxy: The entity sets up traffic to route through a proxy.
meta:enum.network:routing:forwardsPacket: The entity passes a packet toward its destination.
meta:enum.network:routing:redirectsTraffic: The entity diverts traffic to a different destination.
meta:enum.network:routing:routesTraffic: The entity directs network traffic to destinations.
meta:enum.network:routing:tunnelsTraffic: The entity encapsulates traffic within another protocol.
meta:enum.network:trafficControl: Behaviours that manage and manipulate network traffic flow.
meta:enum.network:trafficControl:balancesLoad: The entity distributes requests across destinations.
meta:enum.network:trafficControl:filtersTraffic: The entity blocks or allows traffic based on rules.
meta:enum.network:trafficControl:interceptsTraffic: The entity captures traffic in transit.
meta:enum.network:trafficControl:modifiesTraffic: The entity alters traffic in transit.
meta:enum.network:trafficControl:shapesTraffic: The entity manages traffic timing and priority.
meta:enum.network:transmission: Behaviours that send and receive data over network connections.
meta:enum.network:transmission:broadcastsData: The entity sends data to multiple recipients.
meta:enum.network:transmission:multicastsData: The entity sends data to a group of recipients.
meta:enum.network:transmission:receivesData: The entity accepts data from the network.
meta:enum.network:transmission:sendsData: The entity transmits data over the network.
meta:enum.network:transmission:streamsData: The entity continuously transmits or receives data.
meta:enum.privacy: Behaviours relating to the collection and processing of personal and sensitive data.
meta:enum.privacy:collection: Behaviours that gather personal or sensitive information from individuals or systems.
meta:enum.privacy:collection:capturesAudio: The entity records sound via microphone.
meta:enum.privacy:collection:capturesVideo: The entity records images via camera.
meta:enum.privacy:collection:collectsBehavioralDat: The entity records user actions and patterns.
meta:enum.privacy:collection:collectsCommunication: The entity captures message or call contents.
meta:enum.privacy:collection:collectsDeviceInforma: The entity gathers device identifiers or characteristics.
meta:enum.privacy:collection:collectsFinancialData: The entity gathers payment or financial information.
meta:enum.privacy:collection:collectsHealthData: The entity gathers protected health information.
meta:enum.privacy:collection:collectsInBackground: The entity gathers data without active user engagement.
meta:enum.privacy:collection:collectsLocationData: The entity gathers geographical position information.
meta:enum.privacy:collection:collectsPersonalData: The entity gathers personally identifiable information.
meta:enum.privacy:collection:collectsSilently: The entity gathers data without user awareness.
meta:enum.privacy:collection:readsBrowserHistory: The entity accesses web browsing history.
meta:enum.privacy:deletion: Behaviours that remove or destroy personal data.
meta:enum.privacy:deletion:clearsCache: The entity removes data from temporary storage.
meta:enum.privacy:deletion:purgesFromBackup: The entity removes data from backup systems.
meta:enum.privacy:deletion:redactsData: The entity removes specific content from records.
meta:enum.privacy:inference: Behaviours that derive personal information through analysis and correlation of data.
meta:enum.privacy:inference:correlatesData: The entity combines data from multiple sources.
meta:enum.privacy:inference:createsProfile: The entity builds a profile from collected data.
meta:enum.privacy:inference:fingerprintsDevice: The entity identifies device via characteristics.
meta:enum.privacy:inference:infersPersonalInformat: The entity derives personal data from other data.
meta:enum.privacy:inference:linksIdentities: The entity associates data across contexts.
meta:enum.privacy:inference:tracksUser: The entity follows user activity across sessions.
meta:enum.privacy:minimization: Behaviours that reduce the amount or sensitivity of personal data processed.
meta:enum.privacy:minimization:aggregatesData: The entity combines records into summaries.
meta:enum.privacy:minimization:filtersData: The entity removes unnecessary data elements.
meta:enum.privacy:minimization:limitsCollection: The entity gathers only necessary data.
meta:enum.privacy:minimization:limitsProcessing: The entity restricts data use to stated purposes.
meta:enum.privacy:minimization:pseudonymizesData: The entity replaces identifiers with pseudonyms.
meta:enum.privacy:privacyEnhancement: Behaviours that employ technical measures to protect privacy during processing.
meta:enum.privacy:privacyEnhancement:addsDifferent: The entity injects noise to protect individuals.
meta:enum.privacy:privacyEnhancement:computesMulti: The entity performs joint computation privately.
meta:enum.privacy:privacyEnhancement:processesHomo: The entity computes on encrypted data.
meta:enum.privacy:retention: Behaviours that store personal data over time.
meta:enum.privacy:retention:archivesData: The entity moves data to long-term storage.
meta:enum.privacy:retention:backsUpData: The entity creates copies for recovery.
meta:enum.privacy:retention:enforcesRetentionPerio: The entity deletes data after specified time.
meta:enum.privacy:retention:retainsBeyondPurpose: The entity keeps data longer than necessary.
meta:enum.privacy:retention:retainsInCache: The entity keeps data in temporary storage.
meta:enum.privacy:retention:retainsInLog: The entity keeps data in log files.
meta:enum.privacy:retention:storesPersonalData: The entity saves personal data persistently.
meta:enum.privacy:sharing: Behaviours that disclose personal data to third parties or across boundaries.
meta:enum.privacy:sharing:disclosesToThirdParty: The entity transmits personal data externally.
meta:enum.privacy:sharing:exportsData: The entity outputs data in portable format.
meta:enum.privacy:sharing:publishesData: The entity makes data publicly available.
meta:enum.privacy:sharing:sellsData: The entity provides data in exchange for value.
meta:enum.privacy:sharing:sharesWithAffiliate: The entity provides data to related entities.
meta:enum.privacy:sharing:transfersCrossBorder: The entity sends data across jurisdictions.
meta:enum.privacy:subjectRights: Behaviours that fulfil data subject rights under privacy regulations.
meta:enum.privacy:subjectRights:correctsData: The entity modifies inaccurate personal data.
meta:enum.privacy:subjectRights:exportsDataPortabl: The entity provides data in portable format.
meta:enum.privacy:subjectRights:honorsErasureReque: The entity deletes data upon request.
meta:enum.privacy:subjectRights:honorsObjection: The entity ceases processing upon objection.
meta:enum.privacy:subjectRights:providesDataAccess: The entity gives individuals their data.
meta:enum.privacy:subjectRights:restrictsProcessin: The entity limits data use upon request.
meta:enum.privacy:transparency: Behaviours that inform individuals about data processing activities.
meta:enum.privacy:transparency:disclosesProcessing: The entity reveals data processing activities.
meta:enum.privacy:transparency:explainsAutomatedDe: The entity describes automated decision logic.
meta:enum.privacy:transparency:requestsConsent: The entity asks for processing permission.
meta:enum.safety: Behaviours relating to the prevention of harm to users and the environment.
meta:enum.safety:autonomousBehavior: Behaviours that govern decision-making boundaries and human oversight of autonomous systems.
meta:enum.safety:autonomousBehavior:acceptsOverrid: The entity yields to human command.
meta:enum.safety:autonomousBehavior:explainsDecisi: The entity provides rationale for its action.
meta:enum.safety:autonomousBehavior:requestsGuidan: The entity asks for human direction.
meta:enum.safety:autonomousBehavior:respectsDecisi: The entity stays within authorised decision scope.
meta:enum.safety:contentSafety: Behaviours that detect and filter harmful or inappropriate content.
meta:enum.safety:contentSafety:detectsHarmfulConte: The entity identifies potentially harmful content.
meta:enum.safety:contentSafety:detectsMisinformati: The entity identifies false or misleading content.
meta:enum.safety:contentSafety:enforcesAgeRestrict: The entity limits access by user age.
meta:enum.safety:contentSafety:filtersContent: The entity blocks or restricts content.
meta:enum.safety:contentSafety:labelsContent: The entity marks content with warnings or ratings.
meta:enum.safety:harmPrevention: Behaviours that actively protect users and bystanders from physical or psychological harm.
meta:enum.safety:harmPrevention:preventsEnvironmen: The entity acts to protect the environment.
meta:enum.safety:harmPrevention:preventsPropertyDa: The entity acts to protect physical property.
meta:enum.safety:harmPrevention:preventsUserHarm: The entity acts to protect users from injury.
meta:enum.safety:harmPrevention:protectsBystanders: The entity considers safety of non-users.
meta:enum.safety:hazardManagement: Behaviours that identify and mitigate potentially dangerous conditions.
meta:enum.safety:hazardManagement:assessesRisk: The entity evaluates severity and likelihood of harm.
meta:enum.safety:hazardManagement:identifiesHazard: The entity detects a potentially harmful condition.
meta:enum.safety:hazardManagement:mitigatesHazard: The entity reduces hazard severity or likelihood.
meta:enum.safety:hazardManagement:reportsHazard: The entity communicates a hazardous condition.
meta:enum.safety:humanInteraction: Behaviours that manage communication and interaction with human operators.
meta:enum.safety:humanInteraction:adaptsForAccessi: The entity adjusts for users with disabilities.
meta:enum.safety:humanInteraction:managesCognitive: The entity limits information to prevent overwhelm.
meta:enum.safety:humanInteraction:requestsConfirma: The entity requires human approval for action.
meta:enum.safety:humanInteraction:warnsOperator: The entity alerts human to abnormal condition.
meta:enum.safety:operationalSafety: Behaviours that enforce safe operating limits and conditions.
meta:enum.safety:operationalSafety:acceptsManualOv: The entity yields control to human operator.
meta:enum.safety:operationalSafety:enforcesInterlo: The entity prevents unsafe operation combinations.
meta:enum.safety:operationalSafety:enforcesOperati: The entity prevents operation outside safe bounds.
meta:enum.safety:operationalSafety:executesEmergen: The entity immediately halts dangerous operation.
meta:enum.safety:operationalSafety:monitorsWatchdo: The entity checks for uncontrolled operation.
meta:enum.safety:operationalSafety:validatesSafety: The entity confirms safe operating state.
meta:enum.security: Behaviours relating to the protection of systems and data from unauthorised access and threats.
meta:enum.security:auditing: Behaviours that record security-relevant events for accountability and forensic analysis.
meta:enum.security:auditing:logsSecurityEvent: The entity records a security-relevant occurrence.
meta:enum.security:auditing:protectsAuditLog: The entity prevents tampering with log records.
meta:enum.security:auditing:purgesLog: The entity deletes old log records.
meta:enum.security:auditing:rotatesLog: The entity archives and starts new log files.
meta:enum.security:auditing:signsLogEntry: The entity cryptographically signs audit records.
meta:enum.security:auditing:timestampsEvent: The entity records when an event occurred.
meta:enum.security:auditing:transmitsLog: The entity sends log data to a remote destination.
meta:enum.security:authentication: Behaviours that verify the identity of users and entities.
meta:enum.security:authentication:bypassesAuthenti: The entity permits access without authentication.
meta:enum.security:authentication:capturesBiometri: The entity collects biometric data for authentication.
meta:enum.security:authentication:delegatesAuthent: The entity relies on external identity provider.
meta:enum.security:authentication:locksAccount: The entity prevents further authentication attempts.
meta:enum.security:authentication:performsMultiFac: The entity requires multiple authentication factors.
meta:enum.security:authorization: Behaviours that determine and enforce access permissions.
meta:enum.security:authorization:delegatesAuthorit: The entity transfers access rights to another.
meta:enum.security:authorization:deniesAccess: The entity refuses a requested action.
meta:enum.security:authorization:enforcesRole: The entity restricts actions based on assigned role.
meta:enum.security:authorization:evaluatesAttribut: The entity uses attributes for access decisions.
meta:enum.security:authorization:evaluatesPolicy: The entity applies rules to make access decisions.
meta:enum.security:authorization:grantsAccess: The entity permits a requested action.
meta:enum.security:authorization:grantsImpersonati: The entity permits another to act within its security context.
meta:enum.security:authorization:impersonatesUser: The entity performs actions within another user's security context.
meta:enum.security:authorization:requestsImpersona: The entity initiates a request to act as another user.
meta:enum.security:authorization:revokesAccess: The entity withdraws previously granted permissions.
meta:enum.security:authorization:revokesImpersonat: The entity terminates another's permission to act on its behalf.
meta:enum.security:cryptography: Behaviours that employ cryptographic operations to protect data confidentiality and integrity.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:checksRevocation: The entity queries certificate revocation status.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:decryptsData: The entity restores encrypted data to readable form.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:destroysKey: The entity securely erases a key.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:encryptsData: The entity transforms data to prevent unauthorised reading.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:exchangesKey: The entity shares a key with another party.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:generatesKey: The entity creates a cryptographic key.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:generatesRandomVal: The entity produces a cryptographically secure random value.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:hashesData: The entity generates a cryptographic hash.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:issuesCertificate: The entity creates and signs a digital certificate.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:retrievesKey: The entity obtains a stored key.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:rotatesKey: The entity replaces a key with a new one.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:signsData: The entity creates a digital signature.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:storesKey: The entity saves a key securely.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:verifiesHash: The entity validates data against a hash.
meta:enum.security:cryptography:verifiesSignature: The entity validates a digital signature.
meta:enum.security:errorHandling: Behaviours that manage error conditions to prevent information disclosure.
meta:enum.security:errorHandling:catchesException: The entity intercepts an error condition.
meta:enum.security:errorHandling:disclosesErrorDet: The entity reveals internal information in error messages.
meta:enum.security:errorHandling:failsClosed: The entity denies access when controls fail.
meta:enum.security:errorHandling:failsOpen: The entity permits access when controls fail.
meta:enum.security:errorHandling:generatesError: The entity produces an error condition.
meta:enum.security:errorHandling:logsError: The entity records an error condition.
meta:enum.security:errorHandling:propagatesError: The entity passes an error to caller.
meta:enum.security:errorHandling:returnsGenericErr: The entity provides minimal error information.
meta:enum.security:errorHandling:suppressesError: The entity hides an error condition.
meta:enum.security:inputHandling: Behaviours that validate and sanitise input data to prevent injection attacks.
meta:enum.security:inputHandling:escapesInput: The entity encodes special characters in input.
meta:enum.security:inputHandling:normalizesInput: The entity converts input to standard form.
meta:enum.security:inputHandling:rejectsInvalidInp: The entity refuses malformed or dangerous input.
meta:enum.security:inputHandling:sanitizesInput: The entity removes potentially harmful content from input.
meta:enum.security:inputHandling:truncatesInput: The entity shortens input to acceptable length.
meta:enum.security:inputHandling:validatesFormat: The entity verifies input conforms to expected format.
meta:enum.security:inputHandling:validatesRange: The entity ensures values fall within acceptable bounds.
meta:enum.security:inputHandling:validatesSchema: The entity checks input against a defined schema.
meta:enum.security:integrity: Behaviours that verify and protect the integrity of data and code.
meta:enum.security:integrity:attestsIntegrity: The entity provides evidence of its own integrity.
meta:enum.security:integrity:respondsToTampering: The entity reacts to detected tampering.
meta:enum.security:integrity:validatesComponent: The entity verifies authenticity of a dependency.
meta:enum.security:integrity:verifiesIntegrity: The entity confirms data or code has not been altered.
meta:enum.security:integrity:verifiesProvenance: The entity confirms origin and history.
meta:enum.security:outputHandling: Behaviours that encode and filter output data to prevent information leakage.
meta:enum.security:outputHandling:encodesOutput: The entity transforms output to prevent injection.
meta:enum.security:outputHandling:escapesOutput: The entity encodes special characters in output.
meta:enum.security:outputHandling:filtersOutput: The entity removes sensitive content from output.
meta:enum.security:outputHandling:masksOutput: The entity obscures sensitive data in output.
meta:enum.security:outputHandling:setsSecurityHead: The entity adds security-related HTTP headers.
meta:enum.security:session: Behaviours that manage authenticated user sessions.
meta:enum.security:session:createsSession: The entity establishes an authenticated session.
meta:enum.security:session:detectsSessionHijacking: The entity identifies unauthorised session use.
meta:enum.security:session:regeneratesSessionId: The entity creates a new session identifier.
meta:enum.security:session:terminatesSession: The entity ends an authenticated session.
meta:enum.security:threatResponse: Behaviours that detect and respond to security threats and incidents.
meta:enum.security:threatResponse:blocksRequest: The entity refuses a suspicious request.
meta:enum.security:threatResponse:blocksSource: The entity prevents further requests from a source.
meta:enum.security:threatResponse:collectsForensic: The entity gathers evidence for investigation.
meta:enum.security:threatResponse:detectsAnomaly: The entity recognises deviation from normal patterns.
meta:enum.security:threatResponse:detectsIntrusion: The entity identifies a potential security breach.
meta:enum.security:threatResponse:initiatesInciden: The entity triggers security response procedures.
meta:enum.security:threatResponse:quarantinesEleme: The entity isolates a suspicious item.
meta:enum.security:threatResponse:raisesAlert: The entity notifies of a security event.
meta:enum.system: Behaviours relating to operating system interactions and the management of computational resources.
meta:enum.system:configuration: Behaviours that read and modify system configuration settings.
meta:enum.system:configuration:deletesRegistryKey: The entity removes entries from the registry.
meta:enum.system:configuration:modifiesGroupPolicy: The entity changes group policy settings.
meta:enum.system:configuration:readsConfigurationF: The entity loads settings from a configuration file.
meta:enum.system:configuration:readsEnvironmentVar: The entity retrieves an environment variable value.
meta:enum.system:configuration:readsGroupPolicy: The entity retrieves group policy settings.
meta:enum.system:configuration:readsRegistry: The entity retrieves values from the system registry.
meta:enum.system:configuration:setsEnvironmentVari: The entity modifies an environment variable.
meta:enum.system:configuration:writesConfiguration: The entity saves settings to a configuration file.
meta:enum.system:configuration:writesRegistry: The entity stores values in the system registry.
meta:enum.system:informationGathering: Behaviours that collect information about the host system and its configuration.
meta:enum.system:informationGathering:detectsOsVer: The entity determines the operating system version.
meta:enum.system:informationGathering:gathersSyste: The entity collects system configuration details.
meta:enum.system:informationGathering:retrievesHos: The entity obtains the system hostname.
meta:enum.system:kernelInteraction: Behaviours that interact directly with the operating system kernel.
meta:enum.system:kernelInteraction:installsDriver: The entity loads a kernel-mode driver.
meta:enum.system:kernelInteraction:readsKernelMemo: The entity accesses kernel memory space.
meta:enum.system:kernelInteraction:writesKernelMem: The entity modifies kernel memory space.
meta:enum.system:lifecycle: Behaviours associated with an entity's initialisation, operation, maintenance, and retirement.
meta:enum.system:lifecycle:appliesUpdate: The entity installs software or firmware updates.
meta:enum.system:lifecycle:decommissions: The entity securely retires from service.
meta:enum.system:lifecycle:initializes: The entity performs start-up routines and loads configuration.
meta:enum.system:lifecycle:performsSelfTest: The entity verifies its own operational readiness.
meta:enum.system:lifecycle:provisions: The entity configures itself for deployment.
meta:enum.system:lifecycle:rollsBack: The entity reverts to a previous known-good state.
meta:enum.system:lifecycle:shutsDown: The entity executes orderly cessation of operations.
meta:enum.system:operationalState: Behaviours that govern an entity's functional status and mode of operation.
meta:enum.system:operationalState:entersFailSafeSt: The entity transitions to a known safe state upon detecting a fault.
meta:enum.system:operationalState:entersFailSecure: The entity denies access or ceases sensitive operations upon detecting a security fault.
meta:enum.system:operationalState:operatesInDegrad: The entity continues operation with reduced functionality.
meta:enum.system:operationalState:operatesNormally: The entity performs its intended functions within designed parameters.
meta:enum.system:operationalState:performsEmergenc: The entity immediately halts to prevent harm or damage.
meta:enum.system:persistence: Behaviours that establish mechanisms for an entity to survive system restarts.
meta:enum.system:persistence:createsScheduledTask: The entity schedules itself for recurring execution.
meta:enum.system:persistence:installsAsService: The entity registers itself as a system service.
meta:enum.system:persistence:loadsAsKernelModule: The entity loads itself into the kernel.
meta:enum.system:persistence:registersForStartup: The entity configures itself to execute at system boot.
meta:enum.system:persistence:removesPersistence: The entity removes its persistence mechanism.
meta:enum.system:processControl: Behaviours that create and manipulate operating system processes.
meta:enum.system:processControl:createsProcess: The entity starts a new process.
meta:enum.system:processControl:dumpsProcessMemory: The entity extracts memory contents from a process.
meta:enum.system:processControl:hooksFunction: The entity intercepts and redirects function calls.
meta:enum.system:processControl:injectsCodeIntoPro: The entity inserts executable code into another process.
meta:enum.system:processControl:modifiesProcess: The entity changes attributes of a running process.
meta:enum.system:processControl:resumesProcess: The entity continues paused process execution.
meta:enum.system:processControl:terminatesProcess: The entity ends a running process.
meta:enum.system:resilience: Behaviours that enable an entity to detect faults and maintain operation despite adverse conditions.
meta:enum.system:resilience:activatesRedundancy: The entity activates backup systems or alternative processing paths.
meta:enum.system:resilience:degradesGracefully: The entity progressively reduces functionality rather than failing abruptly.
meta:enum.system:resilience:detectsFault: The entity identifies an internal fault or anomalous condition.
meta:enum.system:resilience:recoversFromFailure: The entity restores normal operation following a failure.
meta:enum.system:resilience:toleratesFault: The entity continues operation despite the presence of a fault.
meta:enum.system:resourceManagement: Behaviours that allocate and deallocate computational resources such as memory and threads.
meta:enum.system:resourceManagement:allocatesMemor: The entity reserves memory for use.
meta:enum.system:resourceManagement:deallocatesMem: The entity releases previously allocated memory.
meta:enum.system:resourceManagement:handlesResourc: The entity responds to depleted resources.
meta:enum.system:resourceManagement:managesPowerSt: The entity transitions between power consumption states.
meta:enum.system:resourceManagement:readsFromStora: The entity retrieves data from persistent storage.
meta:enum.system:resourceManagement:resumesThread: The entity continues paused thread execution.
meta:enum.system:resourceManagement:spawnsThread: The entity creates a new execution thread.
meta:enum.system:resourceManagement:terminatesThre: The entity ends an execution thread.
meta:enum.system:resourceManagement:writesToStorag: The entity saves data to persistent storage.
meta:enum.system:serviceControl: Behaviours that manage system services and daemons.
meta:enum.system:serviceControl:createsService: The entity installs a system service or daemon.
meta:enum.system:serviceControl:deletesService: The entity removes a system service.
meta:enum.system:synchronization: Behaviours that coordinate access to shared resources across concurrent execution contexts.
meta:enum.system:synchronization:acquiresMutex: The entity obtains exclusive access via mutex.
meta:enum.system:synchronization:signalsEvent: The entity triggers a synchronisation event.
meta:enum.system:synchronization:waitsOnEvent: The entity blocks until an event is signalled.
meta:enum.system:synchronization:waitsOnSemaphore: The entity blocks until semaphore is available.
meta:enum.system:timing: Behaviours that govern temporal aspects of execution including scheduling and synchronisation.
meta:enum.system:timing:enforcesDeadline: The entity ensures completion within a timing constraint.
meta:enum.system:timing:executesScheduledTask: The entity performs a task at a predetermined time.
meta:enum.system:timing:resetsWatchdog: The entity signals continued operation to a watchdog monitor.
meta:enum.system:timing:synchronizesClock: The entity aligns its internal clock with an external source.
meta:enum.system:timing:triggersTimeout: The entity acts upon detecting an unresponsive condition.
meta:enum.system:timing:waits: The entity pauses execution for a specified duration.
meta:enum.system:userManagement: Behaviours that create and manipulate user accounts and privileges.
meta:enum.system:userManagement:createsUserAccount: The entity adds a new user account.
meta:enum.system:userManagement:deletesUserAccount: The entity removes a user account.
meta:enum.system:userManagement:elevatesPrivileges: The entity gains higher access permissions.
meta:enum.system:userManagement:impersonatesUser: The entity assumes another user's identity.
meta:enum.system:userManagement:modifiesUserAccoun: The entity changes user account properties.
